title: NFL-BA: Improving Endoscopic SLAM with Near-Field Light Bundle Adjustment
authors: Andrea Dunn Beltran, Daniel Rho, Marc Niethammer, Roni Sengupta
summary: We introduce a Bundle Adjustment loss using lighting cues to improve pose and map estimation in dense visual SLAM for endoscopy.

title: PPS-Ctrl: Controllable Sim-to-Real Translation for Colonoscopy Depth Estimation
authors: Xinqi (Ana) Xiong, Andrea Dunn Beltran, Jun Myeong Choi, Marc Niethammer, Roni Sengupta
summary: PPS-Ctrl fuses Stable Diffusion and ControlNet, guided by physics-informed shading for structure-preserving endoscopy image translation.

title: VIN-NBV: A View Introspection Network for Next-Best-View Selection for Resource-Efficient 3D Reconstruction
authors: Noah Frahm, Dongxu Zhao*, Andrea Dunn Beltran*, Ron Alterovitz, Jan-Michael Frahm, Junier Oliva, Roni Sengupta
summary: The VIN predicts reconstruction-quality gains for candidate views using 3D-aware features to improve 3D scene reconstruction.

title: Modulation of tau tubulin kinases (TTBK1 and TTBK2) impacts ciliogenesis
authors: Frances Bashore, Ariana Marquez, Apirat Chaikuad, Stefanie Howell, Andrea Dunn, Alvaro Beltran, Jeffery Smith, David Drewry, Adriana Beltran & Alison Axtman
summary: We designed a targeted library and identified chemical tools that engage TTBK1/2 and inhibit their downstream signaling.
